title: Master Yi's design inspiration? (Wutai/Shinra??)
body:
This may or may not have been covered, but has anyone ever linked Master Yi to the Wutai or Shinra troops from Final Fantasy? Or has Rito ever publicly announced that Master Yi may have taken some inspiration from them on his design?

I mean we all know {{champion:45}} had some inspiration drawn from Vivi in FFIX.

Also on a side note, please design an official Aerith Lux skin <3
